WorkItem.Description:
Add a setting to choose if, when publishing an update, the Update File Wizard always open :
 - on a preconfigurated path.
 - on the last used path.
 - on a preconfigurated path for the main file, and the same path than the main file for additionnal files.
WorkItem.Summary: Remember last used or preconfigurated path

Comments.Message:
Adding a new option in the 'updates' tab of the Settings form.
Let the user to choose if, when creating a new update, the file Wizard always open:
 - on the last used path.
 - On the same specified path

When the second option is choose, user can decide if, for additionnal files, the path is substitute by the path of the main update file.
